ygData.subject: RE: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, maybe someone at Verant didn t realize it was company policy not to further associate bards with the caster classes (ala Shimmering Orb, various Totems,
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, maybe someone at Verant didn't realize it was company policy not to
further associate bards with the caster classes (ala Shimmering Orb, various
Totems, etc.) Hopefully they won't get sacked for it!

Kitasi the hopeful and even more desperate for that Guise!

-----Original Message-----
From: M Sanford [mailto:pr0teus@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 2:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Temple of Solusek Ro


From: M Sanford <pr0teus@...>

Someone asked earlier if there were any bard quests currently in the
Temple of Solusek Ro. Well due to level 50 boredom, I make a newbie dark
elf on the test server and went to check it out.

There are indeed 2 bard NPCs there, but they were in fact the only 2
NPCs in there who wouldnt talk to me. They con'd apprehensive, while
everything else was indifferent no matter what race/class it was.

So far I've only seen NPCs for misc stuff (resetting your specialization
skills), Necros, Wizards, Mages, Clerics, and Bards. So guess we lucked
out so far unless they're still adding other quest NPCs for other
classes.

Maev Lorekeeper
Tarew Marr
